description: This file implements the basic container object functions for an internal component called 'Ansc Lpc Connector Object' within a network service system. It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the connector, focusing on interface setup, timer objects, and resource management.

classes.name: ANSC_LPC_CONNECTOR_OBJECT
classes.description: Structure representing the basic container object for the Ansc Lpc Connector, including member variables for interfaces, timers, locks, and configuration parameters.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE AnscLpccoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Ansc Lpc Connector Object, setting its name, context handles, and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Cleans up and destroys the specified connector object, freeing resources and removing associated timers and interfaces.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Allocates and sets up interface structures, timer objects, and related resources required by the connector object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscLpccoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the connector object, setting default values, member function pointers, and synchronization primitives.
